item.title: Networks and socioecosystems
Predictive modelling of plant communities
item.description: class: fullbleed, math background-color: black .absolute.w-100pct.pa-2.center.t-40pct.ba.bw-0.br-0.bg-white-80pct[ Predictive modelling of plant communities Challenges for a dynamical approach ] layout: true .footer[ - iboulangeat - april 2019, ECOVEG 14, Toulouse ] class: Prediction in community ecology .absolute.l-4.t-4[Why?] .absolute.l-10pct.t-5[climate change habitat fragmentation land-use changes changes in disturbances changes of human practices] – .absolute.r-6.t-4[What?] .absolute.l-50pct.t-5[species composition species diversity (taxonomic, functional, phylogenetic) community-level attributes (annual biomass production, canopy height, …)] class: Modelling approach class:
